description.title: description
description.description: A description for the extension. Required if the extension is not a VSIX.

displayName.title: displayname
displayName.description: A display name for the extension. Required if the extension is not a VSIX.

icon.title: icon
icon.description: An icon for the extension. Required if the extension is not a VSIX. Can be relative to the current json file's directory.

installTargets.title: installtargets
installTargets.description: A list of install targets for the extension. At least one is required if the extension is not a VSIX.

items.title: installtarget
items.description: An installation target for the extension.

sku.title: install target sku
sku.description: The SKU name of the installation target.

version.title: install target version range
version.description: The version range of the install target that the extension can be installed to.

internalName.title: internal name
internalName.description: The internal name of the extension. A marketplace extension is identified as 'publisherName'.'internalName'. Cannot contain spaces.

language.title: language
language.description: The default language the extension applies to. Must be a CLR locale code or an lcid code.

tags.title: tags
tags.description: A list of tags for the extension.

version.title: version
version.description: The version of the extension. Required if the extension is not a VSIX.

vsixId.title: vsixid
vsixId.description: The vsix identifier of the extension.

assetFiles.title: assetfiles
assetFiles.description: A list of assets to include in the package sent to the marketplace.

pathOnDisk.title: pathondisk
pathOnDisk.description: A path to the file to include in the package. Can be relative to the current json file's directory.

targetPath.title: targetpath
targetPath.description: The path to embed the file in the package. This can be referenced from your overview file via an image link, for example

categories.title: categories
categories.description: A list of categories that the extension applies to.

anyOf.title: category
anyOf.description: A valid category on the marketplace that the extension applies to.

overview.title: overview
overview.description: A path to a markdown file that will be displayed on the extension's page in the marketplace. The path can be relative to the current json file's path.

priceCategory.title: pricecategory
priceCategory.description: The pricing model for the extension.

publisher.title: publisher
publisher.description: The publisher of the extension. Must not be a display name of the publisher.

private.title: private
private.description: If true, the extension will be uploaded as a private extension.

qna.title: q&a
qna.description: If true, the extension will have a Q&A page on the marketplace.

repo.title: repo
repo.description: A URL that points to the GitHub repo for the extension.
